New Records: De'Aaron Fox became the fifth player in Kings' franchise history to eclipse 10,000 career points.
De'Aaron Fox moves to the 2nd most steals in the Sacramento era with 671 career steals.
Key Match Events: The Kings held the Jazz to 14 third-quarter points en route to their first 15+ point win, the second blowout victory of the young 2024-25 regular season.
Pre-Game Insights: Fox talked about playing with desperation after the Kings' 0-2 start to the regular season.
Post-Match Reflections: Fox is off to having another productive campaign and remains the No. 1 option on offense ahead of Sabonis and DeRozan.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Kings recognized Fox's accomplishment and posted a highlight of the steal that bumped him up the list on their X, formerly Twitter, account.
Others: Domantas Sabonis finished with a game-high 28 points, 11 rebounds, and four assists.
Jordan Clarkson's 21 points led the Jazz.
